website_summaries.verdict: The TP-Link AC1900 Touch Screen Wi-Fi Gigabit Router Touch P5 delivers solid 5GHz throughput performance, and its color touch screen makes it very easy to configure.
pros: Easy to set up and configure

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish Router
customer_reviews.text: Very tetchy router. Easy to set up but the touch panel is again - very tetchy, may take several attempts to register a command. Very little in the way of a signal boost. Repeater failed to work. Lots of drop outs until it failed completely after around 1 month - returned - well trying to as Amazons Hermes collection never bothered turning up... Overall (at present) there's better available out there, more reliable and faster, the touch screen is a gimmick and a poor one, so best save money and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ian Davies

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless coverage. Slow touch screen
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Virgin Superhub with this (put the Superhub in modem mode). My wifi is massively improved and now reaches everywhere on the ground floor of my house. It's a bit fiddly to setup and the touch screen is a bit slow, but has been in place for a couple of months and working well
customer_reviews.author: simski6

customer_reviews.title: Really quick and easy to set up with a simple UI
customer_reviews.text: Really quick and easy to set up with a simple UI. The touch screen is a bit of a gimick, but I wanted a quick way/ backup into the router without the need of a device. I have to say the design looks really cool,l much better than the plain white one - but you pay for this! WiFi coverage to my first floor is very good and I have very thick walls.
customer_reviews.author: Mr KB!

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Setup took 10 min using on screen display. Using Virgin hub i was getting wifi signal strength @ 75% and speeds of 30mbps. Using this router my signal strength increased to 100%, and full speed of 100mbps which is whats on my line. Never knew wifi could be this good, this easy.
customer_reviews.author: Luke W

customer_reviews.title: Great router
customer_reviews.text: Excellent router, the screen makes it simple to set up and use
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Keeps losing connecting and have to reboot almost everyday. Very sketchy and the distance isn’t as good as was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant improvements to my broadband speeds and Wi-Fi connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant improvements to my broadband speeds and Wi-Fi connectivity. Love the different priority settings to ensure the right devices take the bandwidth they need.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Used as a repeater but it can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Used as a repeater but it can be an AP or a router. Touch screen is a nice touch as it saves logging onto a computer to set it up. Good range and extends my wifi all around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Collins

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FAST POWER HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: PUMPS OUT THE POWER AND IS SO SUPER FAST,LOVING IT
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. Getting over 200mbps on 5ghz upstairs 40ft away from router through plethora of walls. Bought to replace Virgin SH3.0 and not disappointed. Bargain.
customer_reviews.author: I keep buying junk from amazon

customer_reviews.title: Wireless range (through walls) is appalling
customer_reviews.text: ++ Great design Easy to set up Good features -- Wireless range (through walls) is appalling - wont work in a room 4 meters away I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great or is it?!
customer_reviews.text: Looks excellent, configured in minutes, absolutely useless as a repeater! My Home Hub has proven more capable on its own, this device offers me nothing. Perhaps its better as a pure router?
customer_reviews.author: Dressage Husband

customer_reviews.title: Got for wifi nothing else
customer_reviews.text: I bought this somewhere else and cheaper , be aware when you buy this , it is not modem router , you have to run wire from your old modem to this router I found it a bit pointless that is why I took it book.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kasprowicz

product_meta.title: TP-Link AC1900 Dual Band Touch Screen Wireless Gigabit Cable Gaming Router, 1 GHz Dual-Core Processor, USB 3.0, 2.0 Ports, Support Range Extender and Access Point Mode, UK Plug (Touch P5)
product_meta.description:
TP-LINK AC 1900. Wi-Fi band: Dual-band (2.4 GHz / 5 GHz), Wi-Fi standard: IEEE 802.11ac, Wi-Fi standards supported: IEEE 802.11a, IEEE 802.11ac, IEEE 802.11b, IEEE 802.11g, IEEE 802.11n. Ethernet LAN interface type: Gigabit Ethernet, Ethernet LAN data rates: 10,100,1000 Mbit/s. Network standard: IEEE 802.11a, IEEE 802.11ac, IEEE 802.11b, IEEE 802.11g, IEEE 802.11n. Antenna type: External. Firewall security: DoS, SPI Firewall, IP

BOX CONTAINS
1 x TP-Link Touch P5 AC1900 - Wireless router - 4-port switch - GigE - 802.11a/b/g/n/ac - Dual Band
feature_bullets: One-Minute Touchscreen Setup - Effortlessly set up a network and modify settings with the responsive touchscreen
Ease of Use - Manage settings, including parental controls, access policies, mode selection, and more as easy as using an app on smartphone
Superior Coverage – Three dual band antennas with high-powered amplifiers provide powerful Wi-Fi across your home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars32 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
